subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous queen of Rajasthan was known for her bravery and strong leadership?
question_hi: राजस्थान के प्रभावी और सरल नेतृत्व के लिए कौन सी राजधानी की प्रथमधिक अंकार जानती थी?
explanation_en: Rani Mahendra Pratap was a famous queen of Rajasthan and known for her bravery and strong leadership. She is often referred to as Rani Mahendra Pratap or Rani Mahendra Patani.
explanation_hi: राजानंद मेहन्ता राजस्थान के फ़िता राजानंद

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Mughal emperor established the city of Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर को कौन स्थान करवाई करवाई होंकों के परिवाद से क्षम घराणी सिंहाँ
explanation_en: Akbar, the Mughal Emperor, established the city of Jaipur. He was known for his strategic importance and cultural influence in Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: मुगल ओकर, जापुर को सिंग की सीतावाद सबसीतावाद बॉबी

subject: Rajasthan Culture
question_en: Which traditional dance form is popular in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्तान का सांग कालेन कौममान वाली
explanation_en: Grand Thikana is a traditional dance form popular in Rajasthan. It is a folk dance performed by women as a part of cultural events.
